description: Detects suspicious child process creations of VMware Tools process which may indicate persistence setup
author: bohops
Bhabesh Raj
name: VMToolsd Suspicious Child Process
query: ((process.parent.executable:/.*\\\\[Vv][Mm][Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND ((process.executable:(/.*\\\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:(/[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Ww][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))) AND (NOT (((process.executable:/.*\\\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\\\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\ [Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss]\\\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Oo][Nn]\-[Vv][Mm]\-[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\.[Bb][Aa][Tt].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\ [Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss]\\\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Oo][Ff][Ff]\-[Vv][Mm]\-[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\.[Bb][Aa][Tt].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\ [Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss]\\\\[Rr][Ee][Ss][Uu][Mm][Ee]\-[Vv][Mm]\-[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\.[Bb][Aa][Tt].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\ [Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss]\\\\[Ss][Uu][Ss][Pp][Ee][Nn][Dd]\-[Vv][Mm]\-[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\.[Bb][Aa][Tt].*/))) OR ((process.executable:/.*\\\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line.text:)) OR ((process.executable:/.*\\\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND NOT _exists_:process.command_line.text)))))
